data.title: Amadeus details
data.meta_description: Amadeus portrays the rivalry between the genius Mozart (Tom Hulce) and the jealous court composer (F.Murray Abraham) who may have ruined Mozart's career and shortened his life.
data.text:
Description: Amadeus portrays the rivalry between the genius Mozart (Tom Hulce) and the jealous court composer (F.Murray Abraham) who may have ruined Mozart's career and shortened his life.

Production Company The Saul Zaentz Company, AMLF

Release Date Sep 12, 1984

Duration 2 h 40 m

Rating PG

Tagline The man... The music... The madness... The murder... The motion picture...
